caption.p:
Spatial distributions of node vulnerabilities F
i in the SAT network. ( a) Shows the results from NCEP reanalysis data, while ( bâ€“ p) shows the simulated results from the 15 models. Nodes with higher frequency (chance) of being isolated are marked by dark color. This figure is generated using Ferret (version6.9, http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/Ferret/documentation/release-notes/version-6-9-release-notes).
